rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall integrating Vastu principles to allow positive energy flow. The design includes natural lighting and ventilation.
Spacious living room designed with colonial elements, offering comfortable seating and natural light. Decorated with traditional Indian textiles.
Compact yet functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into the Colonial aesthetic. Positioned per Vastu to maintain a clear work triangle.
Master bedroom with colonial style detailing and ample natural lighting. Includes storage for personal belongings, ensuring a calm atmosphere.
Private bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed for comfort and privacy.
